true but not really more like a hill.... there's a "hill" in my schools yard place thing... it's about idk 2/3 yard high...(live in spring ,TX)

the user below me want use to post more ponies.
the user below me tolerates bronies.

Yep, wish I was one, but it always feels weird when I watch it. I could really use the acceptance and tolerance I see in the MLP community, since my mum emotionally abuses me.

True, being an half of one myself, but they are very... Intrusive? Addicted? Something like that.
